description: BN_mod_exp may produce incorrect results on x86_64
overview:
As noted by the OpenSSL team, the likelihood of being able to craft a practical
attack that uses this flaw is very low. In addition, Node.js enables
SSL_OP_SINGLE_DH_USE, further decreasing the chance of a successful exploit of
this vulnerability in a Node.js service.

All active versions of Node.js are affected, but the severity is very low for
Node.js users.
